comments.body:
This is dropping the port and favoring host before `InetAddress`. I'm guessing the `port` could still be necessary?

Put another way, I think the typing of the return type could be stronger. OTOH, if there's a reason to drop all and just keep `host` then I think a comment with that reason would be great.
I think the port isn't really used with Couchbase because it opens up a whole set of ports on each cluster node.
